function transfer(address to, uint256 amount) returns (bool)
function ubuntuMine(address to, string memory knowledgeProof, uint256 knowledgeLevel)
function rewardUbuntuContribution(address contributor, uint256 amount, string memory action)
event UbuntuMining(address indexed miner, uint256 amount, string knowledgeProof)
event UbuntuContribution(address indexed contributor, uint256 amount, string action)
